committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize the additional use of land in the City of Pittsburg, California.

summary.text: Allows the city of Pittsburg, California, to use a specified parcel of land conveyed to the city by the United States for a fire station or other public purposes, or to transfer such land to another governmental entity for such purpose, notwithstanding certain restrictive covenants otherwise applicable.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the additional use of land in the City of Pittsburg, California.
